title: Mr Penumbras 24-Hour Bookstore out of the shadows

content.prompt: In context, the narrator’s description in the sixth paragraph of Penumbra as someone who comes “out of the shadows” serves to link Penumbra with the

choices.label: fantastic characters in his book collection
ladders and bookshelves in the back of the store
lengthy years he has spent alone

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Describe the relationship between a character and a setting.
